channel.title: EASYRSC Problem
channel.description:
So I Just downloaded the EASYRSC Server and client, and it seems like whenever i compile the server it stops working. Like Ill copy it to my desktop ( all the required files from my external HardDrive ) and then ill mess around with the sever... ( log in, walk around Log Off ) Then I try to compile the server, and when i try to run the server Agian it wont Load I just get The little DOS menu and then it dissapears and dosent do anything.
I need help anyone?
